DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate if changes in ocular signs and symptoms occur in patients with ocular hypertension or glaucoma when they switch from latanoprost 0.005% (Xalatan) to preservative free Tafluprost eye drops.
DOC.brief_title: Ocular Signs and Symptoms in Glaucoma Patients Switched From Latanoprost 0.005% to Preservative Free Tafluprost Eye Drops
DOC.criteria: Patients with a diagnosis of ocular hypertension or open angle glaucoma for which the patient has been using latanoprost 0.005% as his/her prior medication. Evaluable patients must have ocular surface related symptoms and/or signs with their prior medication.
